channel.title: 8.1 on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 8.1 on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.7 Is Available
item.description: A new patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available! This release includes several significant improvements and numerous bug fixes. In this article, we’ll explore these updates in detail.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.6 Is Available
item.description: A new patch version for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 2 security issues.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.5 Is Available
item.description: Another patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available. This release contains interesting improvements as well as a number of bug fixes. In this article, we’ll lean into them because there’s plenty to write about!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.4 Is Available
item.description: It’s been decided to release a security patch for version 8.1 of PrestaShop.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.3 Is Available
item.description: We are entering the new year with the release of PrestaShop 8.1.3. The latest update for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available. This version brings two security updates, addresses close to 30 known issues, and introduces various enhancements.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.2 is available
item.description: The second patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available! This release contains 2 security fixes, over 30 bugs have been fixed and some minor improvements have been integrated.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.1 Is Available
item.description: The first patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available. This release contains a few security fixes, so we highly recommend you to upgrade your shop as soon as possible.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Is Available
item.description: We are pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.1 is officially available.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: We are happy to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.1.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 is ready for translation
item.description: PrestaShop’s 8.1 beta release was announced a few months ago. The stable release is now just around the corner. While it brings new features, a new version also means new strings. A file containing all 8.1 strings has been pushed to Crowdin, and is ready for translation!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The beta version of PrestaShop 8.1 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 is now in feature freeze
item.description: As of February 1, 2023, PrestaShop version 8.1 has entered the feature freeze phase. This article provides more information about the feature freeze, what the next steps will be, and what to expect from PrestaShop 8.1.
